name: CaveThumb
description:
Survive as long as you can.

Collect resource and craft a stone axe.

Hunt a mammoth.

Controls

  • Move - WASD
  • Pick up resources/eat - Left Mouse Button
  • Harvest resources/Hunt - Right Mouse Button
  • Craft stone axe - Space bar while near campfire - (requires 1 stone and 1 stick)
  • Rotate Camera - Q/E

Keep an eye on your red health bar, green stamina bar, and orange hunger bar.
